RemoveThrowableItem.Title: Remove Throwable Item
RemoveThrowableItem.Hint: Whether or not throwable items get removed from the inventory when thrown

AddThrowableToTargetInventory.Title: Add Throwable Item to Target Inventory
AddThrowableToTargetInventory.Hint: Whether or not throwable items get added to the target inventory when hit

AddAmmunitionToTargetInventory.Hint: Whether or not ammunition items get adedd to the target inventory when hit

CreateItemPilesOnMiss.Title: Create Item Piles on Miss
CreateItemPilesOnMiss.Hint: Whether or not Item Piles will be created when a projectile misses the target

CreateItemPilesOnHit.Title: Create Item Piles on Hit

SnapCreatedItemPilesToGrid.Title: Snap Created Item Piles to Grid
SnapCreatedItemPilesToGrid.Hint: Whether or not Item Piles created by this module should snap to grid

MinifyItemPilesNames.Title: Minify Item Piles Names

SetElevationOfItemPiles.Title: Set Elevation of Item Piles
